casebody.data:
First Department,

December, 1978

(December 5, 1978) Alfred S. Goldfield et al., As Executors of Gladys M. Ludwig, Deceased, v Daniel K. Ludwig, Respondent.

Order, Supreme Court, New York County, entered April 10, 1978, unanimously affirmed without costs and without disbursements. Appeal from order of said court entered March 17, 1978, dismissed as academic, without costs and without disbursements. No opinion. Concur—Murphy, P. J., Lupiano, Evans, Markewich and Sullivan, JJ.
